text:
was a Japanese supercentenarian who was at the age of 112, the oldest living man in Japan since the death of 111-year-old Jokichi Ikarashi on 23 July 2013, when he was 110 years old. Momoi became the oldest living man in the world after Alexander Imich died on 8 June 2014.
Momoi died at a hospital in Tokyo, Japan from kidney failure at the age of 112.
